code: /* eslint-disable react/jsx-no-comment-textnodes */import React,{useState}from"react";import{useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import{IonButton,IonContent,IonHeader,IonInput,IonPage,IonTitle,IonToolbar}from"@ionic/react";import{saveDataSupplier}from"./SupplierApi";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SupplierAdd=()=>{const history=useHistory();const[supplier,setSupplier]=useState({id:"",name:"",address:"",phone:""});const handleSave=()=>{let newSupplier={id:supplier.id,name:supplier.name,address:supplier.address,phone:supplier.phone};let saved=saveDataSupplier(newSupplier);if(saved){history.goBack();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonPage,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonHeader,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonToolbar,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonTitle,{children:"Agregar Proveedor"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonInput,{placeholder:"ID",value:supplier.id,onIonChange:e=>setSupplier({...supplier,id:e.detail.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonInput,{placeholder:"Nombre",value:supplier.name,onIonChange:e=>setSupplier({...supplier,name:e.detail.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonInput,{placeholder:"Direcci\xF3n",value:supplier.address,onIonChange:e=>setSupplier({...supplier,address:e.detail.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonInput,{placeholder:"Tel\xE9fono",value:supplier.phone,onIonChange:e=>setSupplier({...supplier,phone:e.detail.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonButton,{expand:"full",onClick:handleSave,children:"Guardar"})]})]});};export default SupplierAdd;
